title: Evil Thirst
description: The Last Vampire's love and pride.Alisa's daughter, Kalika, a bloodthirsty monster with powers far beyond Alisa's, is gone. It is Alisa's task to track her down and destroy her.Yet Alisa still has trouble believing her daughter is totally evil. She still hopes to save Kalika, even if it means risking her own lifeâ€”and perhaps the lives of everyone in the world.Cover art by Joe Danisi
author: Christopher Pike
